definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: And when he saw their faith, he said unto him, Man, thy sins are forgiven thee.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌見他們的信心，就對癱子說，你的罪赦了。

sentences.english: When Jesus saw their faith, he said unto the sick of the palsy, Son, thy sins be forgiven thee.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌見他們的信心，就對癱子說，小子，你的罪赦了。

sentences.english: Some men brought to him a paralytic, lying on a mat.
sentences.chinese: 有人用褥子擡着一個癱子，到耶穌跟前來。

sentences.english: Jesus heals a man brought on his sleeping mat by four friends.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌醫好一個躺在褥子上由四個朋友擡來的癱子。

sentences.english: 3Some men came, bringing to him a paralytic, carried by four of them.
sentences.chinese: 有人帶着一個癱子來見耶穌，是用四個人擡來的。

sentences.english: And they come unto him, bringing one sick of the palsy, which was borne of four.
sentences.chinese: 有人帶着一個癱子來見耶穌，是用四個人擡來的。
